Posts.Content: Amy04 wrote: Hi! I am new to this but I'm hoping someone might be able to help. I was diagnosed last June with breast cancer I had a double mastectomy followed by 16 chemo treatments and then 36 radiation treatments. I finished radiation in February but now my hard and lumpy. The lumpy area doesn't move, it does sometimes hurt a little. Has anyone experienced anything like this? Thanks for the help!Â  Log in to post a reply
